string.name: fragment_playground_you_are_on_this_playground
string.u: YAAAY! You are playing right here at the moment! Enjoy the game!

string.name: fragment_playground_you_are_on_another_playground
string.u: You are playing on %s at the moment! To join this game, please, end another one

resources.string: Oops! Sorry, playgrounds won\'t work without location data. Please provide location access permission in settings
